arts.sum: Newly promoted Sassuolo will be hoping to get their first win of the season this weekend, following a defeat to Napoli and Cremonese in their opening two games. Lazio will be hoping to follow up thei...

arts.ttl: Sassuolo vs. Lazio - prediction, team news, lineups
arts.sum: Sports Mole previews Sunday's Serie A clash between Sassuolo and Lazio, including predictions, team news and possible lineups.
